channel.title: Comments on: MySQL Cluster 7.3 GA – Includes MySQL Cluster Auto-Installer
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/mysql-cluster/mysql-cluster-7-3-auto-installer#comment-657468">Hemachandhiran</a>.
Thanks for your question but I'm afraid that I no longer work for Oracle (I'm now working for MongoDB) and so am not current on MySQL technology. I'd suggest checking the <a href="http://forums.mysql.com/list.php?25" rel="nofollow">MySQL Cluster forum</a>.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Hemachandhiran.

Thanks for your question but I’m afraid that I no longer work for Oracle (I’m now working for MongoDB) and so am not current on MySQL technology. I’d suggest checking the MySQL Cluster forum.

item.title: By: Hemachandhiran
item.dc:creator: Hemachandhiran
item.description:
Hi Andrew,
I am intend to install MySQL Cluster 7.5.4 on Debian using auto installer. I have 3 dedicated servers. These are my questions 1. Do we need to install MySQL Cluster 7.5.4 in all 3 servers before starting Auto Installer? 2. Do we need to install MySQL server on SQL node servers?
Can you specify steps to which components need to be installed in all servers before starting Auto Installer?
Thanks in advance
item.content:encoded:
Hi Andrew,

I am intend to install MySQL Cluster 7.5.4 on Debian using auto installer.
I have 3 dedicated servers.
These are my questions
1. Do we need to install MySQL Cluster 7.5.4 in all 3 servers before starting Auto Installer?
2. Do we need to install MySQL server on SQL node servers?

Can you specify steps to which components need to be installed in all servers before starting Auto Installer?

Thanks in advance

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/mysql-cluster/mysql-cluster-7-3-auto-installer#comment-637680">Aquiles Araujo</a>.
The cluster package includes the modified MySQL Server; you cannot use the 'standard' MySQL Server.
Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Aquiles Araujo.

The cluster package includes the modified MySQL Server; you cannot use the ‘standard’ MySQL Server.

Andrew.

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/mysql-cluster/mysql-cluster-7-3-auto-installer#comment-637693">Aquiles Araujo</a>.
You need to execute the mysqld command from an account other than root.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Aquiles Araujo.

You need to execute the mysqld command from an account other than root.

item.title: By: Aquiles Araujo
item.dc:creator: Aquiles Araujo
item.description:
Hello Andrew,
How to solve this Problem??
++++++++++++ Command `nohup /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqld --defaults-file=/root/MySQL_Cluster/55/my.cnf' exited with 1: nohup: appending output to `nohup.out' 2016-08-19 15:09:31 0 [Warning] TIMESTAMP with implicit DEFAULT value is deprecated. Please use --explicit_defaults_for_timestamp server option (see documentation for more details). 2016-08-19 15:09:31 0 [Note] /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqld (mysqld 5.6.31-ndb-7.4.12-cluster-gpl) starting as process 3897 ... 2016-08-19 15:09:31 3897 [ERROR] Fatal error: Please read "Security" section of the manual to find out how to run mysqld as root!
2016-08-19 15:09:31 3897 [ERROR] Aborting
2016-08-19 15:09:31 3897 [Note] Binlog end 2016-08-19 15:09:31 3897 [Note] /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqld: Shutdown complete
++++++++++++
item.content:encoded:
Hello Andrew,

How to solve this Problem??

++++++++++++
Command `nohup /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqld –defaults-file=/root/MySQL_Cluster/55/my.cnf’ exited with 1:
nohup: appending output to `nohup.out’
2016-08-19 15:09:31 0 [Warning] TIMESTAMP with implicit DEFAULT value is deprecated. Please use –explicit_defaults_for_timestamp server option (see documentation for more details).
2016-08-19 15:09:31 0 [Note] /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqld (mysqld 5.6.31-ndb-7.4.12-cluster-gpl) starting as process 3897 …
2016-08-19 15:09:31 3897 [ERROR] Fatal error: Please read “Security” section of the manual to find out how to run mysqld as root!

2016-08-19 15:09:31 3897 [ERROR] Aborting

2016-08-19 15:09:31 3897 [Note] Binlog end
2016-08-19 15:09:31 3897 [Note] /usr/local/mysql/bin/mysqld: Shutdown complete

++++++++++++

item.title: By: Aquiles Araujo
item.dc:creator: Aquiles Araujo
item.description:
Hello Andrew,
First, thank you for help us with MySQL Cluster.
1. Question:
To install the MySQL cluster, do I need also to install the MySQL Server or the Install cluster package has already the MySQL included? I want to install MySQL Cluster in 4 Linux Machine (RedHat 6).
Thank you in advanced.
Regards, Aquiles
item.content:encoded:
Hello Andrew,

First, thank you for help us with MySQL Cluster.

1. Question:

To install the MySQL cluster, do I need also to install the MySQL Server or the Install cluster package has already the MySQL included?
I want to install MySQL Cluster in 4 Linux Machine (RedHat 6).

Thank you in advanced.

Regards,
Aquiles

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/mysql-cluster/mysql-cluster-7-3-auto-installer#comment-631524">Sana</a>.
MySQL Cluster needs to be installed on all of the servers (the mysqld is actually different from the standard MySQL one).
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sana.

MySQL Cluster needs to be installed on all of the servers (the mysqld is actually different from the standard MySQL one).

item.title: By: Sana
item.dc:creator: Sana
item.description: Hi Andrew, I don't know anything about MySQL cluster.I want your help in my project.I have 4 servers.shall I install cluster on each machine on windows or on one machine cluster installed and others only need MySQL installed.
item.content:encoded:
Hi Andrew,
I don’t know anything about MySQL cluster.I want your help in my project.I have 4 servers.shall I install cluster on each machine on windows or on one machine cluster installed and others only need MySQL installed.

item.title: By: andrew
item.dc:creator: andrew
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/mysql-cluster/mysql-cluster-7-3-auto-installer#comment-560220">Al Mamun</a>.
Thanks for your question. I'm no longer directly involved with MySQL (I'm now with MongoDB) and so I'd suggest that you seek help from <a href="http://forums.mysql.com/" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">http://forums.mysql.com/</a>.
Best Regards, Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Al Mamun.

Thanks for your question. I’m no longer directly involved with MySQL (I’m now with MongoDB) and so I’d suggest that you seek help from http://forums.mysql.com/.

Best Regards, Andrew.
